The articles published on the website ca: 000 times on Facebook, indicating a wide reach and potential influence of the claim.
The government: s official portal for Nigeria's Covid-19 survival fund is "survivalfund.gov.ng," while the fake website mentioned in the claim is "survivalfund.ng," highlighting the difference in URLs and suggesting the authenticity of the official portal.
Nigeria: s junior minister for industry, trade, and investment, Mariam Katagum, confirmed the existence of the survival fund program, stating that it would support 1.7 million entities and individuals for an initial duration of three months.
